Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius). Lightly grease a 2-quart casserole dish.
Cook the carrot and turnip cubes in a large pot of salted water until tender, approximately 20 minutes. Drain well before using.

Combine the diced carrots and turnips, cover with salted water, then cook until tender, drain, and let them steam dry. Mash the vegetables with butter, salt, flour, and sugar. Mix eggs and milk separately, then combine with the mashed veggies and transfer to a casserole dish. Sprinkle cinnamon sugar on top before baking.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 25 to 30 minutes.
